text: Peroshah or Pero Shah () is a historical village and union council in Gujrat District, Pakistan, about from the district headquarters of Gujrat. There is a government high school in the village. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gujrat District Very famous ,fearless gujjars , 4 mohallah (lainda, charda,dhakhan and parbat) . wonderful people of peroshah , various religious parties (The most famous are peer khaki shah sarkar (Qalandar) and Brailvee (Sunni )
title: Peroshah
